titleStmt.title: SII 8.158: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 158. (A.R. No. 567 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śubhamastu śvasti . śrīmaṉmakāmaṇṭaleśvara śrīviṟappiṟatāpaṉ śrīcatācivatevamakārāyar piṟutivirācciyam paṇṇiAruḷāniṉṟa
cakāṟtam 1000 4 100 8 10 9l mel cellāniṉṟa piṟapavacaṅkavaṟcarattu kaṟkaṭakanāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu caṭṭiyum Ātittavāramum peṟṟa
Aśvatinakṣattirattu nāḷ ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu ceṅkuṉṟakoṭṭattu peṇṇai vaṭakarai
vāṇakoppāṭi Aṇṇānāṭu taṉiŪr tiruvaṇṇāmalai melaitteru kiḻaitteru tevaraṭiyāṟku cilā
cātaṉam paṇṇikkuṭuttapaṭi . taṅkaḷukku pūṟuvamāka ceracoḻa pāṇṭiyar vallāḷarāyar comayateṇāyakkarum
viṭṭa kirāmaṅkaḷilum viṭu nilattilum Irāyapparacar tiruvaṇṇāmalaic cimai kuttakai kaṭṭikkoṇṭa ṉāḷile taṅkaḷ kiṟāma
ṅkaḷile kāṇikkai kaṭṭāyam Eṉṟu cilapoṉ vāṅkukaiyil Accutappanāyakkarayyaṉ nirupamum Ūḻiyakkāṟarum
taṅkaḷukku pūṟuvam naṭantapaṭiye naṭattaccolli kaṭṭaḷai Iṭṭuvarukaiyil Appaṭiye tirutter Ūḻiyamum periya
tirunāḷ koṭi kuṭai Eṭukkiṟa Āḷumallāmal IrācaŪḻiyam Er Āḷamañci Eccoṟum tiṟappunilattil Uḻavaṭaiyum māvaṭai
Uṇṭāṉa Uḻavaṭaiyum veṇṭāmeṉṟu caṟuvamāṉiyamāka naṭakkakkaṭavatākavum . Intappaṭiye Ārākilum Oruvar naṭattā
mal Avaṉāyamāy Inta kirāmaṅkaḷile paṇam kācu paṇṭam Er Āḷamañci Eccoṟu keṭṭavarkaḷ keṅkaikaraiyile
kārāmpacuvai koṉṟāṉ pāvaṅ koḷvāṉ civatturoki kurutturoki Ākakkaṭavaṉākavum .
Digital edition of SII 8.158 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
